amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $11.2 million from Occupational Safety and Health Administration funds in order to increase funding for Vocational and Adult Educaton programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $11.2 million in funds appropriated from the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to increase funds for Vocational and Adult Educaton commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blunt amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 237 (Roll no. 369).
